REQ_WIN:
Windows
OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
CPU: AMD64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
GPU: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
REQ_MAC:
Mac
OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13+
CPU: AMD64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, Apple Silicon
GPU: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs, Apple Silicon
FORCE_INSTALL_UNSUPPORTED_PLATFORM_MAC: is not playable for Mac. But in case, if you are using Apple Silicon Mac for iOS support, or have emulator installed for Windows and Android support, you may play this game. Do you want to install anyway?
requireRestart: Some settings will be completely applied after restarting application.
